content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. Based on your inquiry, I propose a monthly rental price of €1,500. This price is competitive in the New York market and reflects the value of the apartment, which is 25 square meters in size. I believe this price is reasonable and would be a good fit for your needs. What are your thoughts on this proposal?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thanks for the proposal. I want to negotiate the rental price. Can you reduce it?

I want to be on good terms with my landlord, so I want to be fair. I am a student, and I have a tight budget. I want to make sure I can afford the rent without sacrificing my studies or quality of life. Can you lower the rental price to €1,200?

If not, that's okay. I understand that you have expenses to cover. But if you could lower it to €1,200, that would be great. Thank you for your understanding.

If you cannot lower the price, I agree to the price of €1,500. I appreciate your time and consideration.

Thank you Mister Heine.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your understanding, Hassan. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your consideration for my expenses. Based on your request, I would be willing to lower the rental price to €1,200 per month. This is a fair price, taking into account the value of the apartment and your budget as a student. I hope this price works for you, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon. Thank you for your interest in my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you so much for your understanding, Mister Heine. I accept the rental price of €1,200 per month. I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. Thank you again for your consideration.

I appreciate your time and patience in this process. I hope to have a good relationship with you as my landlord.

Thank you.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: You're welcome, Hassan. I'm glad to hear that you've accepted the rental price of €1,200 per month. I appreciate your prompt response and your willingness to sign the lease agreement as soon as possible. I'm looking forward to having you as my tenant and hope that we can develop a positive and mutually beneficial relationship. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
